column4: Hi, i was wondering if anyone could give me a hand, when i use the "update manager" i get the following error message "Not all updates can be installed" "Run a partial upgrade, to install as many updates as possible"
What would a partial upgrade be ? would that upgrade me from 10.4 LTS to the latest non LTS ?
that means that not all dependencies of updated packages can be satisfied (e.g. medibuntu is often overloaded, so w32codecs can't be installed) this is completely different from a version upgrade
